fields.text: A girl is sitting on a chair and using the computer .
fields.pos: DT NN AUX VBZ P DT NN CC VBZ DT NN PUN

fields.text: Behind her a cat and a dog are on the floor .
fields.pos: PRP PRP DT NN CC DT NN AUX P DT NN PUN

fields.text: The dog is watching the girl .
fields.pos: DT NN AUX VBZ DT NN PUN
